inclusion.criterion: ability to speak English or Spanish
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: scheduled to undergo carotid artery angioplasty and/or stent-supported angioplasty
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Axis I psychiatric diagnosis or drug abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has carotid bruits and significant bilateral carotid stenosis, but no residual deficits from prior CVA. Scheduled for carotid artery angioplasty and/or stent-supported angioplasty.
